alert.note: Alert for Holt (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 23 at 10:26PM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Holt County through 1115 PM CDT... At 1026 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Page, or 16 miles southeast of O`neill, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Ewing and Page. This includes Highway 20 between mile markers 319 and 328. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. This storm may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.
